ğŸ” Description
ğŸš€This week, choosing what to buy will be challenging with the addition of multiple new airports, several helipads, and various scenery enhancements. The scenery updates mainly focus on improving night lighting in cities, while the airport enhancements bring an impressive level of detail to several locations. A mix of well-known and lesser-known developers have contributed airports such as Stapleford Airfield, Libreville International Airport, San Jose Airport, Ketchikan International Airport, and Svalbard Longyearbyen Airfield. And these are just a few highlights, as there are many more options available.
